title: Night Hawk: F-117A Stealth Fighter 2.0
description:
Night Hawk: F-117A Stealth Fighter 2.0

Emulate MS-DOS with DOSBox to play this game.




F-117A Stealth Fighter 2.0 Control Keys

'+','-' - thrust
SHIFT-'+' - full throttle
SHIFT-'-' - zero throttle

1 - flare
2 - chaff
3 - IRJ
4 - ECM
5 - decoy
6 - gear
7 - autopilot
8 - bay
9 - flaps
0 - brake

F1 - cockpit view
F2 - change HUD mode
F3 - change map mode
F4 - light
F5 - weapon
F6 - FLIR
F8 - waypoints
F9 - ILS
F10 - orders

SHIFT-F1 - external view #1
SHIFT-F2 - external view #2
SHIFT-F3 - external view side
SHIFT-F4 - weapon view

SHIFT-F10 - eject

z,y - zoom (map, external view)
c - change cockpit view
v - change HUD

m - track-cam left
, - track-cam right
. - track-cam rear
/ - track-cam ahead


BACKSPACE - gun
SPACE - change weapon
RETURN - release weapon

INSERT - change keyboard sensitivy

ALT-D - detail
ALT-V - change sound
ALT-F - framerate
ALT-N - night/day
ALT-C - change cockpit view
ALT-R - refuel
ALT-H - HUD change
ALT-T - training on/off
ALT-B - boss key
ALT-P - pause
ALT-Q - quit
